snippet: The F.T.C. just approved a $29 billion merger of Express Scripts and Medco, but competition among pharmacy benefit managers appears to be alive and well.
abstract: Editorial supports decision by the Federal Trade Commission to approve the merger between Express Scripts and Medco Health Solutions, two of the three largest companies that manage pharmaceutical benefits for employers and health plans; cites FTC's thorough eight-month inquiry as well as the growing number of competitors to the major providers.
lead_paragraph: The F.T.C. just approved a $29 billion merger of Express Scripts and Medco, but competition among pharmacy benefit managers appears to be alive and well.

headline.seo: Costs, Benefits and Your Prescription Plan
headline.main: Costs, Benefits and Your Drug Plan
headline.print_headline: Costs, Benefits and Your Drug Plan
